fullReactions.title: I DON’T WANT TO DISAPPOINT
fullReactions.description: I’m avoiding people because I don’t want to disappoint them

fullReactions.title: I'M CONCERNED
fullReactions.description: I’m concerned about how unacceptable my behaviour could get

fullReactions.title: I’M ABSORBED
fullReactions.description: I’m absorbed by the possible threatening future

fullReactions.title: I’M ADDING WRONGS
fullReactions.description: I’m mentally adding wrongs that haven't arrived yet

fullReactions.title: I’M FULL OF FEAR
fullReactions.description: I’m possessed by fear of possible negatives

fullReactions.title: I’M AVOIDING
fullReactions.description: I’m missing opportunities because of avoiding what’s not good for me

fullReactions.title: IT WILL GET WORSE
fullReactions.description: I’m caught up in inappropriate crippling fear of what could get even worse

fullReactions.title: I'M WARDING OFF
fullReactions.description: I’m caught up in warding off some negative future

fullReactions.title: I’M DEFENSIVE
fullReactions.description: I’m too quick to say “No”, focussing too much on what could go wrong

fullReactions.title: I’M DELAYING
fullReactions.description: I'm slowing things down unnecessarily just so they feel less threatening to me

fullReactions.title: I’M IN DISPAIR
fullReactions.description: I’m despairing and depressed that I can’t keep things from going wrong again and again

fullReactions.title: I’M FEELING DEPRESSED
fullReactions.description: I’m feeling depressed about being unable to prevent wrongs from happening again

fullReactions.title: I’M FREAKING OUT
fullReactions.description: I’m freaking out while also thinking it isn’t ok to be freaked out

fullReactions.title: I’M KEYED UP
fullReactions.description: I’m keyed up to prevent something that may not even be threatening

fullReactions.title: I’M MISSING OPPORTUNITIES
fullReactions.description: I’m too busy preventing wrong to notice what is going right, missing opportunities

fullReactions.title: I’M OBESSING
fullReactions.description: I’m obsessing about things getting worse

fullReactions.title: I’M PANICKING
fullReactions.description: I’m experiencing inappropriate crippling fear

fullReactions.title: I’M LOSING PROGRESS
fullReactions.description: I’m losing progress, playing it too safe for fear of losing control

fullReactions.title: I WANT CONTROL
fullReactions.description: I’m preoccupied with bringing things under control so they can’t get any worse

fullReactions.title: I’M PREOCCUPIED
fullReactions.description: I’m preoccupied by what I don't want to go wrong

fullReactions.title: I’M SCARED
fullReactions.description: I’m scaring myself about things going wrong before anything is actually going wrong

fullReactions.title: I’M DEMOTIVATED
fullReactions.description: I’m over-concerned and stressed, which holds down motivation and dampens my spirits

fullReactions.title: I’M STRESSED
fullReactions.description: I’m experiencing constant stress which is slowing down my progress

fullReactions.title: I’M TENSE
fullReactions.description: I’m very concerned and tense about preventing future negatives

fullReactions.title: IT SHOULDN'T BE
fullReactions.description: I’m too focussed on “shouldn’t be’s”, and trying not to do the wrong thing

fullReactions.title: I’M TOO ON GUARD
fullReactions.description: I’m constantly on guard and 'preventional' about what might come up

fullReactions.title: I’M TRYING TO PREVENT
fullReactions.description: I’m inappropriately trying to prevent the wrong thing from happening

fullReactions.title: I'M WORRYING ABOUT THINGS
fullReactions.description: I’m worrying way too much about things that aren't even likely

fullReactions.title: I'M WORRYING ABOUT MY BEHAVIOUR
fullReactions.description: I’m too worried about how unacceptable my behaviour could get

fullReactions.title: I NEED TO CONTROL
fullReactions.description: I’m trying to bring things under control so they don’t feel threatening

fullReactions.title: I’M WORRYING TOO MUCH
fullReactions.description: I’m worrying way too much about preventing things that aren’t even likely

fullReactions.title: I’M WORRIED
fullReactions.description: I’m worrying about worrying

fullReactions.title: I'M CREATING MY FEAR
fullReactions.description: My mind is making up things to be afraid of that have little to do with what’s actually going on

fullReactions.title: I'M TOO PREVENTION FOCUSED
fullReactions.description: I’m focusing on what could go wrong and how to prevent that if possible

fullReactions.title: I NEED TO STAY ON TRACK
fullReactions.description: I’m trying not to let things get off track

fullReactions.title: I'M UNABLE TO RELAX
fullReactions.description: I’m unable to relax even when I know I should, I’m tense about future negatives
